hours: Bella's Salon is open Monday to Friday from 9 AM to 6 PM, Saturday from 10 AM to 4 PM, and closed on Sunday.
services: We offer haircuts ($30–$50), coloring ($60–$100), styling ($25–$40), manicures ($20), and pedicures ($30).
booking: You can book by calling 555-123-4567 or online at bellassalon.com.
location: Bella's Salon is located at 123 Main Street, Springfield.
staff: We have 5 stylists and 2 nail technicians.
